body: Almost half the fucking tags in total on this site, let see how good this one is. / And my clit dick said 8.5/10, nice. Packed with Loli x Shota, meant to be; Well Elder with a hung below x Loli is interesting and all, a small thing being expanded to its physical limit (in theory, since 2D non-existing irl and Anime laws and everything e else) is magnificent. But. And then right after that they thrown in an Otaku with a Bri'ish Loli, ffs. And dont forget "breast feeding" from a Loli, fucking marvelous. | At the end of the day, wholesome Ending is all there should be, and Authors should be aiming for, especially in these hopeless time. Fuck "dark deep" writers trying to paint their "my depression in form of marketable medias" as a Story to made money out of it. / huh, "Team COMIC LO", was wondering why this is packed with Lolis Goddess and Goodness.
@lolitome Amen to that. I look forward to Nekodanshaku's work in every Comic LO release. Too bad he has none for September's release. hopefully he has one for October
This artist became one of my favorites last year, good stories and good artstyle
Hopefully this all gets translated, though a few of the stories in there are already translated
